author: wn.com
title: Welcome Dr Marta Coma: CSCT Whorrod Research Fellow (University of Bath)
text: ( Source : University of Bath ) 12 October 2015 We are pleased to welcome our new Whorrod research fellow, Dr Marta Coma , who joined us on Monday 05 October 2015 . This is the fifth post funded by an endowment to the Centre for Sustainable
